text: James "Mark" Wilson (April 11, 1929 - January 19, 2021) was an American magician and author. He was born in Indianapolis, Indiana. He was known for becoming the first major "television magician" and for showing illusions on television format. Wilson died on January 19, 2021 at the age of 91.Mark Wilson, R.I.P. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American magicians Category:American television personalities Category:Actors from Indianapolis
title: Mark Wilson (magician)
